root.name: Denki Groove Jigoku V
root.description: Denki Groove Jigoku V: SweepStation Version is a collection of strange minigames and music-tinged doodads produced by the Japanese technopop duo, Denki Groove.Many of the concepts and even some of the minigames themselves found their way into a later PSP release, which appeared in North America as WTF: Work Time Fun.
